title: Overlord: Ple Ple Pleiades - Nazarick Saidai no Kiki
content:
The new anime installment in the Overlord franchise, "Overlord: Ple Ple Pleiades - Nazarick Saidai no Kiki," is set to be bundled with the 11th volume of the novel series. Fans of the series are in for a treat as the anime will feature the much loved Pleiades combat maids, along with the rest of the Floor Guardians.

It's impressive to see just how much content has been created for the Overlord franchise, with multiple OVAs, recap films, and special editions all being released in addition to the main anime and light novel series. This latest installment is sure to delight fans and further immerse themin the world of Nazarick and its inhabitants.
